author: Ben Cohen
title: This U.S. Olympic Team Practices in a Refrigerated Parking Garage in Slovenia
text:
PYEONGCHANG, South Korea—There is a team of Americans that exploited a very strange advantage on its way to the Olympics, and it was only there for them because the people of a small mountain town in Slovenia had a very strange problem.
They wanted a ski tunnel. They also wanted a parking garage. They didn’t have room for both.
“So what...
